thread.title: Ranji Trophy: MP share a point with UP
thread.title_full: Ranji Trophy: MP share a point with UP - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ranji Trophy: MP share a point with UP
text:
MORADABAD: Madhya Pradesh came up with a fighting reply to Uttar Pradesh's mammoth first innings score to share a point with the hosts in the Ranji Trophy Group B match on Sunday.
MP, starting the day at 234 for 3, ended day four at 528 for 7 in response to UP's 686 for seven.
Aditya Shrivastava, who was batting on 99 overnight, went on to score 169 runs off 401 balls.
The other major contributions came from Naman Ojha (88), Devendra Bundela (80) and Harpeet Singh (88*).
Ankit Rajpoot ended up as the highest wicket-taker for UP with four for 87.
Brief scores: UP 686/7 DECL. MP 528/7 in 172 overs (Aditya Shrivastava 169; Ankit Rajpoot 4/87).
Result: Match Drawn. Points: UP 1, MP 1.
